text: I k samudyanam Salikha, ikh brata, (My poslali), I on skazal: "O moy narod! Allakhu poklonyaytes'! Krome Nego, u vas inogo Boga net. Prishlo k vam yasnoye svidetel'stvo ot vashego Vladyki: Eto - verblyuditsa Allakha, Chto stanet vam znameniyem Yego. Dayte pastis' yey na zemle Allakha, Ne prichinyaya yey vreda, Chtob na sebya surovoy kary ne navlech'
